welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Villeneuve-Loubet, where the Mediterranean sea meets the French countryside. Get ready to indulge in our rich history, delicious cuisine, and breathtaking views. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cote D'azur International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Cote D'azur International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mandelieu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mandelieu Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fontvieille Heliport Airport serves as the primary hub for all flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fontvieille Heliport Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
